title: Turks & Caicos Jet Ski Safari: Explore Hidden Bays & Islands
shortDescription: Experience the thrill of jet skiing through the crystal-clear waters of Turks & Caicos, discovering secluded bays and stunning islands on this guided safari. Enjoy exhilarating speeds and breathtaking scenery.
fullDescription:
Embark on an unforgettable jet ski adventure that takes you beyond the shores of Providenciales and into the heart of the Turks & Caicos archipelago. Our experienced guides will lead you on a thrilling safari, exploring hidden gems like Half Moon Bay, Pine Cay, and Iguana Island. Feel the rush as you glide across turquoise waters, discover secluded beaches, and marvel at the stunning coastal landscapes.

This jet ski safari is perfect for adventurous souls who want to experience the beauty of Turks & Caicos in a unique and exciting way. Whether you're a seasoned jet skier or a first-timer, our friendly instructors will provide comprehensive safety briefings and ensure you feel comfortable and confident on the water. Get ready to create lasting memories as you explore the untouched beauty of the islands.

Along the way, we'll stop at pristine beaches for swimming and snorkeling, giving you the chance to discover the vibrant marine life that thrives beneath the surface. Keep an eye out for playful dolphins, colorful fish, and maybe even a sea turtle or two! This is more than just a jet ski ride; it's an immersion into the natural wonders of Turks & Caicos.

With a maximum group size of 15, you'll enjoy a personalized experience with plenty of opportunities to interact with your guide and fellow adventurers. Our top-of-the-line jet skis are well-maintained and easy to handle, ensuring a safe and comfortable ride. Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping journey that will leave you breathless and wanting more.
highlights: Explore secluded bays and islands only accessible by water.
Experience the thrill of jet skiing in crystal-clear turquoise waters.
Discover hidden beaches and pristine snorkeling spots.
Keep an eye out for dolphins, sea turtles, and other marine life.
Enjoy personalized attention with a small group size.
Perfect for all skill levels, from beginners to experienced riders.
Create unforgettable memories with stunning photo opportunities.
importantInfo: Participants must be at least 12 years old.
Children under 16 must be accompanied by an adult.
A valid driver's license or photo ID is required to operate a jet ski.
Pregnant women and individuals with back or neck problems are not recommended to participate.
All participants must sign a waiver before the tour begins.
Please arrive 15 minutes prior to departure for check-in and safety briefing.

itinerary.description: Meet at JETSURF TCI in Leeward Marina for check-in and safety briefing.
Instruction on jet ski operation and safety procedures.
Jet ski tour begins! Ride to Half Moon Bay, exploring the coastline.
Stop at Iguana Island for a short walk and iguana spotting.
Snorkeling stop at Pine Cay reef.
Jet ski back to Leeward Marina.
Tour concludes at Leeward Marina.

location.meetingPoint: JETSURF TCI, Leeward Marina, Providenciales, Turks & Caicos. Located near the Provo Golf Club.
location.endPoint: JETSURF TCI, Leeward Marina, Providenciales, Turks & Caicos

cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before

title: Discover Bight Reef's Underwater Paradise: Snorkeling Adventure
shortDescription: Explore the vibrant coral reefs and abundant marine life of Bight Reef, one of Turks & Caicos' premier snorkeling spots. Enjoy a guided tour with expert insights into the local ecosystem.
fullDescription:
Dive into a world of breathtaking beauty on our Bight Reef Snorkeling Adventure! This half-day excursion takes you to the pristine waters of Bight Reef (also known as Coral Gardens), a vibrant underwater ecosystem teeming with colorful fish, fascinating coral formations, and other marine wonders. Our experienced guides will provide you with top-of-the-line snorkeling gear and a comprehensive safety briefing before leading you on an unforgettable exploration of this natural treasure.

As you glide through the crystal-clear waters, keep an eye out for parrotfish, angelfish, blue tangs, and even the occasional sea turtle. Our guides will share their knowledge of the local marine life, pointing out interesting features and answering your questions. They'll also ensure your safety and comfort throughout the experience, helping you spot the best viewing areas and navigate the reef with ease.

After your snorkeling adventure, relax on board our comfortable boat as we cruise back to shore, enjoying the stunning views of the Turks & Caicos coastline. This tour is perfect for families, couples, and solo travelers who want to experience the magic of the underwater world in a safe and enjoyable way. Create lasting memories as you discover the beauty that lies beneath the surface!

Don't miss this chance to witness the underwater paradise of Bight Reef! Book your snorkeling adventure today and prepare to be amazed by the vibrant marine life and stunning coral formations that await you.
highlights: Explore the vibrant Bight Reef (Coral Gardens)
Snorkel in crystal-clear turquoise waters
See colorful fish, coral formations, and sea turtles
Receive expert guidance from experienced instructors
All snorkeling gear provided
Enjoy a comfortable boat ride with stunning coastal views
Perfect for families, couples, and solo travelers
included: Boat transportation to and from the reef
notIncluded: Hotel pickup and drop-off (available as an add-on)
Snacks or additional beverages (available for purchase on board)
whatToBring: Cash for gratuities and onboard purchases
importantInfo: Minimum age for participation is 12 years old.
Participants should be comfortable swimming in open water.
Pregnant women and individuals with certain medical conditions may not be able to participate. Please consult with your doctor before booking.
Snorkeling is weather-dependent and may be canceled or rescheduled due to inclement weather.
Maximum group size is 15 participants to ensure personalized attention.

itinerary.description: Meet at Leeward Marina for check-in and safety briefing. Enjoy complimentary bottled water while boarding.
Enjoy a scenic boat ride to Bight Reef (Coral Gardens), with commentary on local landmarks.
Snorkeling at Bight Reef, guided tour of the reef's best spots, and opportunity to observe marine life.
Enjoy some relaxation time on board while the captain prepares the boat for departure. Feel free to have another bottle of water.
Boat ride back to Leeward Marina.
Disembark at Leeward Marina.

location.meetingPoint: Leeward Marina, Providenciales. Located next to the restaurant 'Somewhere Else'.
location.endPoint: Leeward Marina, Providenciales

cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before

title: Explore Grace Bay's Underwater Paradise: Scuba Diving Adventure
shortDescription: Discover the breathtaking coral reefs and marine life of Grace Bay on a guided scuba diving excursion. Perfect for certified divers looking to explore the Turks & Caicos underwater world!
fullDescription:
Immerse yourself in the crystal-clear turquoise waters of Grace Bay, consistently ranked among the world's best beaches, and uncover a vibrant underwater ecosystem teeming with life. This scuba diving excursion is designed for certified divers seeking an unforgettable experience exploring pristine coral reefs, encountering colorful fish, and perhaps even spotting sea turtles or playful dolphins. Our experienced and PADI-certified dive instructors will ensure your safety and guide you through some of the most spectacular dive sites the Turks & Caicos Islands have to offer.

Prepare to be amazed by the diverse marine life inhabiting these reefs, from graceful stingrays gliding along the ocean floor to schools of vibrant tropical fish darting through coral formations. The clarity of the water allows for exceptional visibility, making this dive an incredible opportunity for underwater photography and videography. Whether you're an experienced diver or relatively new to the sport, this excursion will leave you with memories that will last a lifetime.

After your dive, relax and enjoy the stunning scenery of Grace Bay as we cruise back to shore, sharing stories and marveling at the incredible marine life we encountered. This is more than just a dive; it's an adventure into a hidden world of beauty and wonder.
highlights: Explore vibrant coral reefs in Grace Bay's pristine waters
Guided by experienced and PADI-certified dive instructors
Encounter diverse marine life including colorful fish, turtles, and rays
Exceptional visibility for stunning underwater photography
Small group sizes for a personalized diving experience
Convenient boat trip from Grace Bay to prime dive sites
All necessary diving equipment provided
included: All necessary diving equipment (BCD, regulator, mask, fins, wetsuit)
Boat transportation to and from dive sites
notIncluded: Underwater camera rental (available for an additional fee)
Hotel pickup and drop-off (can be arranged for an extra charge)
importantInfo: Participants must be certified scuba divers and present their certification card.
A medical questionnaire must be completed prior to diving.
Individuals with certain medical conditions may not be able to participate. Please consult with your doctor if you have any concerns.
Minimum age is 12 years old.
No alcohol consumption before diving.
The dive site may be subject to change depending on weather conditions.

itinerary.location: Dive Provo Shop, Grace Bay Road
itinerary.description: Meet at Dive Provo shop for check-in and equipment fitting.
Board the dive boat and receive a safety briefing from the dive instructor.
First scuba dive exploring the vibrant coral reef. (Approx. 45 minutes)
Surface interval on the boat with refreshments and discussion of the dive.
Second scuba dive exploring the wall, offering stunning views and diverse marine life. (Approx. 45 minutes)
Return to the dock and disembark the boat. Time to rinse gear and share dive stories!
Return equipment and conclude the excursion.

location.meetingPoint: Dive Provo Shop, Grace Bay Road, Providenciales, Turks & Caicos
location.endPoint: Dive Provo Shop, Grace Bay Road, Providenciales, Turks & Caicos

cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before

title: Turks & Caicos Dreamin': Half-Day Luxury Yacht & Snorkel
shortDescription: Indulge in a luxurious half-day yacht excursion, exploring the pristine waters of Turks & Caicos. Snorkel vibrant reefs, relax on deck, and savor the breathtaking island scenery.
fullDescription:
Escape to paradise aboard a private luxury yacht for an unforgettable half-day adventure. Our experienced captain and crew will whisk you away to explore the stunning turquoise waters and hidden gems of Turks & Caicos. Cruise past breathtaking beaches, including the world-famous Grace Bay, and discover secluded coves perfect for swimming and sunbathing. Dive into the vibrant underwater world at a pristine coral reef teeming with colorful fish and marine life. 

Relax on deck with refreshing drinks and snacks as you soak up the sun and enjoy the gentle sea breeze. Our yacht is equipped with comfortable seating, shaded areas, and a premium sound system, ensuring a relaxing and enjoyable experience for everyone. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion, seeking a romantic getaway, or simply looking for a luxurious escape, this yacht charter is the perfect way to experience the best of Turks & Caicos.

Capture stunning photos of the breathtaking scenery and create lasting memories with your loved ones. Our crew is dedicated to providing exceptional service and ensuring your safety and comfort throughout the excursion. This is more than just a boat tour; it's an immersion into the beauty and tranquility of the Turks & Caicos Islands.
highlights: Luxury yacht experience with professional crew
Snorkeling at a vibrant coral reef
Cruising along Grace Bay and other stunning beaches
Refreshing drinks and snacks included
Comfortable seating and shaded areas on deck
Opportunity to swim and sunbathe in secluded coves
Breathtaking views of the Turks & Caicos coastline
included: Open bar with soft drinks, water, juice
notIncluded: Lunch (can be arranged at an additional cost)
whatToBring: Towel (although provided, you may prefer your own)
importantInfo: Minimum age is 12 years old.
Pregnant women and individuals with back problems are advised to consult their doctor before participating.
This tour is weather dependent. If the weather is unsafe, the tour will be rescheduled or refunded.
Life jackets are provided and must be worn by children under 12.
Please inform us of any dietary restrictions or allergies at the time of booking.
Maximum group size is 15 people.

itinerary.description: Meet your captain and crew at Blue Haven Marina for check-in and boarding the yacht.
Begin your cruise along the beautiful coastline of Providenciales.
Anchor at Coral Gardens Reef for a guided snorkeling experience. Explore the vibrant marine life and colorful coral formations.
Enjoy a leisurely cruise along Grace Bay, stopping at a secluded cove for swimming and relaxation.
Return to Blue Haven Marina, disembarking the yacht.

location.meetingPoint: Blue Haven Marina, Marina Rd, Leeward Settlement, Providenciales, Turks & Caicos Islands. Located at the far end of the marina, near the Dive Provo shop. Please arrive 15 minutes prior to departure.
location.endPoint: Blue Haven Marina, Marina Rd, Leeward Settlement, Providenciales, Turks & Caicos Islands.

cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before

title: Turks & Caicos Sunset Serenity: Sail into Paradise
shortDescription: Experience the magic of a Turks & Caicos sunset aboard a luxurious catamaran. Enjoy breathtaking views, refreshing drinks, and delectable appetizers as the sun dips below the horizon.
fullDescription:
Embark on an unforgettable journey as you sail into the breathtaking Turks & Caicos sunset. Our luxurious catamaran sets the stage for an evening of pure relaxation and stunning natural beauty. As you glide across the turquoise waters, savor handcrafted cocktails, indulge in delicious appetizers, and let the gentle Caribbean breeze caress your skin.

Our experienced crew will guide you to the perfect vantage point, offering fascinating insights into the local marine life and history of the islands. Keep an eye out for playful dolphins leaping through the waves and graceful sea turtles gliding beneath the surface. As the sun begins its descent, the sky transforms into a vibrant canvas of colors, painting a scene you'll cherish forever.

Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or simply seeking a romantic escape, our Sunset Serenity Cruise promises an evening of unparalleled beauty and tranquility. Create memories that will last a lifetime as you witness the magic of a Turks & Caicos sunset in all its glory. Book your spot now and prepare to be captivated!
highlights: Breathtaking sunset views over the Caribbean Sea
Luxurious catamaran experience with comfortable seating
Delicious appetizers and refreshing cocktails included
Opportunity to spot dolphins, turtles, and other marine life
Knowledgeable and friendly crew providing expert insights
Perfect for romantic getaways, celebrations, or relaxation
Unforgettable memories created against a stunning backdrop
included: Open bar (rum punch, beer, soft drinks, water)
Selection of appetizers (fresh fruit, cheese & crackers, conch fritters)
Snorkeling equipment (optional, based on conditions and location)
Safety briefing and guidance from experienced crew
whatToBring: Cash for gratuities and optional purchases
importantInfo: Minimum drinking age is 18 years.
Snorkeling is weather and sea condition dependent.
Please arrive at the meeting point 15 minutes prior to departure.
This tour is not suitable for pregnant women or individuals with serious back problems.
We reserve the right to alter the route or cancel the tour due to unforeseen circumstances (e.g., inclement weather).

itinerary.description: Check-in and boarding at Leeward Marina. Meet the crew and receive a safety briefing.
Depart from the marina and sail towards the sunset. Enjoy appetizers and drinks while cruising along the coast.

itinerary.location: Grace Bay Area (depending on sunset location)
itinerary.description: Anchor in a scenic spot to witness the sunset. Optional snorkeling opportunity (weather permitting).
Begin the return journey to Leeward Marina, enjoying the starlit sky and final moments of the cruise.
Disembark at Leeward Marina.

location.meetingPoint: Leeward Marina, Providenciales. Located near the main gate. Look for the "Sunset Serenity Cruise" sign.
location.endPoint: Leeward Marina, Providenciales

cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before

title: Turks & Caicos Island Vibes: Half-Day Party Boat Adventure!
shortDescription: Soak up the sun and dance to the rhythm of the islands on our exhilarating half-day party boat excursion! Explore pristine waters, snorkel vibrant reefs, and enjoy unlimited drinks with stunning turquoise views.
fullDescription:
Get ready to experience the ultimate Turks & Caicos party on the water! Our half-day party boat adventure is the perfect way to explore the stunning coastline, vibrant coral reefs, and crystal-clear waters that make these islands so special. We'll cruise along the picturesque Grace Bay, known for its powdery white sand and calm turquoise sea, stopping at prime snorkeling spots teeming with colorful fish and marine life. 

Our experienced crew will keep the good times flowing with an open bar serving refreshing cocktails, ice-cold beer, and non-alcoholic beverages. Dance to the latest hits spun by our onboard DJ, or simply relax and soak up the sun on our spacious deck. We'll make sure you have everything you need to create unforgettable memories. 

This is more than just a boat tour; it's an immersive island experience. Feel the cool ocean breeze, enjoy the lively atmosphere, and let the spirit of Turks & Caicos invigorate your soul. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or simply looking for a fun-filled day, our party boat adventure is the perfect choice. Get ready to make some waves!
highlights: Snorkel in vibrant coral reefs teeming with marine life
Enjoy an open bar with refreshing cocktails, beer, and soft drinks
Dance to the latest hits with our onboard DJ
Cruise along the breathtaking Grace Bay coastline
Relax and soak up the sun on our spacious deck
Experience the ultimate Turks & Caicos party atmosphere
Perfect for groups, couples, and solo travelers
included: Open bar (rum punch, beer, soft drinks, water)
importantInfo: Must be 18+ to consume alcohol.
Please arrive at the meeting point 15 minutes prior to departure.
This tour is weather dependent and may be canceled or rescheduled if necessary.
Life jackets are provided and required to be worn during snorkeling.
We promote responsible drinking. Please drink responsibly.

itinerary.description: Meet at Leeward Marina for check-in and safety briefing.
Depart Leeward Marina and cruise along the stunning Grace Bay coastline.
Snorkeling stop at Coral Gardens Reef to explore vibrant marine life.
Continue cruising with music, drinks, and dancing.
Return to Leeward Marina.

location.meetingPoint: Leeward Marina, Providenciales. Located at the end of Leeward Highway, near the ferry dock.
location.endPoint: Leeward Marina, Providenciales

cancellationPolicy: Full refund for cancellations made at least 48 hours prior to departure.

title: Conquer Providenciales: Thrilling ATV Adventure through Paradise
shortDescription: Explore the hidden gems of Providenciales on an adrenaline-pumping ATV tour. Discover secluded beaches, rugged trails, and breathtaking landscapes that are only accessible by off-road vehicle.
fullDescription:
Escape the tourist crowds and embark on an unforgettable ATV adventure through the stunning landscapes of Providenciales. Our expert guides will lead you on a thrilling journey, navigating challenging trails, pristine beaches, and panoramic viewpoints. Feel the rush as you power through diverse terrains, from rocky paths to soft sandy shores. Discover hidden gems like the secluded Sapodilla Bay and enjoy photo opportunities at breathtaking overlooks. This tour is perfect for adventure seekers who want to experience the raw beauty of Turks & Caicos in a unique and exciting way. Get ready to get dirty, have fun, and create lasting memories as you conquer Provo on your own all-terrain vehicle.

Experience the freedom of off-road exploration as you navigate through lush vegetation and along the coastline. Our state-of-the-art ATVs are designed for both comfort and performance, ensuring a smooth and exhilarating ride. Whether you're a seasoned off-roader or a first-time adventurer, our experienced guides will provide you with the necessary training and support to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience. Prepare to be amazed by the natural beauty of Turks & Caicos as you discover hidden trails and secret spots that are off the beaten path.

This isn't just a tour; it's an adventure. It's about feeling the wind in your hair, the sun on your skin, and the thrill of conquering challenging terrain. It's about discovering the hidden beauty of Providenciales and creating memories that will last a lifetime. So, gear up, get ready to ride, and let us take you on the ultimate ATV adventure through paradise. Your unforgettable Turks & Caicos experience awaits!

We prioritize your safety and enjoyment. All tours are conducted with certified guides who are knowledgeable about the local area and experienced in off-road driving. We provide helmets and safety briefings to ensure a secure and fun adventure for all participants.
highlights: Explore hidden trails and secluded beaches of Providenciales
Experience the thrill of off-road driving on a powerful ATV
Visit Sapodilla Bay and enjoy stunning coastal views
Discover panoramic viewpoints and breathtaking landscapes
Enjoy a guided tour with experienced and knowledgeable instructors
Perfect for adventure seekers and nature lovers
Suitable for all skill levels with safety briefing and training provided
whatToBring: Comfortable clothing that can get dirty
importantInfo: Minimum age to drive ATV is 16 years old with a valid driver's license.
Participants under 18 years old must be accompanied by a parent or guardian.
Participants must be in good physical condition to operate an ATV.
Pregnant women and individuals with back problems are not recommended to participate.
Tour operates in all weather conditions unless deemed unsafe by the operator.
Signed waiver required prior to participation.

itinerary.description: Meet at our base, check-in, and complete necessary paperwork. Enjoy a brief safety orientation and ATV driving instructions.
Begin the ATV adventure, heading west along the Leeward Highway, then south towards the scenic Chalk Sound National Park.
Arrive at Sapodilla Bay, enjoy a short break for photos and refreshments. Opportunity to take a quick dip in the shallow, calm waters.
Continue the adventure through rugged trails and off-road paths leading to Taylor Bay. Navigate through diverse terrains and scenic overlooks.
Ride back to the ATV Adventures HQ along the Leeward Highway. Return ATVs and enjoy a refreshing drink before departure.

location.meetingPoint: ATV Adventures HQ, located on Leeward Highway, near the Blue Haven Marina.
location.endPoint: ATV Adventures HQ, Leeward Highway

cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before

title: Crystal Clear Kayak Adventure: Explore Grace Bay's Underwater Wonders
shortDescription: Paddle through the turquoise waters of Grace Bay in a see-through kayak and witness the vibrant marine life below! A unique way to experience the stunning coral reefs and shallow waters of Turks & Caicos.
fullDescription:
Embark on an unforgettable journey through the crystal-clear waters of Grace Bay with our signature see-through kayak tour. Imagine gliding effortlessly over the vibrant coral reefs, spotting colorful fish, and maybe even a sea turtle or two, all from the comfort of your own transparent kayak! Our guided tour takes you to the best snorkeling spots in the area, where you can marvel at the underwater wonders without even getting wet (unless you want to!).

Our experienced and knowledgeable guides will provide you with interesting facts about the local marine ecosystem and point out the unique flora and fauna that call these waters home. This tour is perfect for families, couples, and anyone who wants to experience the beauty of Turks & Caicos in a unique and eco-friendly way. 

We use high-quality, stable, and easy-to-paddle kayaks that are designed for both beginners and experienced kayakers. All necessary equipment, including life vests and paddles, are provided. Get ready to create lasting memories as you explore the hidden gems of Grace Bay from a whole new perspective.

This tour is more than just kayaking; it's an immersive experience that connects you with the stunning natural beauty of Turks & Caicos. Book your adventure today and discover the underwater paradise that awaits!
highlights: Paddle in a clear kayak for amazing underwater views
Explore the vibrant coral reefs of Grace Bay
Spot colorful fish, sea turtles, and other marine life
Guided tour with knowledgeable local experts
Perfect for families and all skill levels
Eco-friendly and sustainable way to explore
Small group size for a personalized experience
importantInfo: Minimum age is 12 years old
Participants should be in good physical condition
Pregnant women are not recommended to participate
Tour is weather dependent and may be cancelled or rescheduled
Snorkeling is optional and at your own risk
Must arrive 15 minutes prior to scheduled departure time

itinerary.location: Leeward Marina, adjacent to the Dive Provo shop
itinerary.description: Meet your guide and receive a safety briefing.
Begin your kayak tour through the calm Leeward Channel towards Grace Bay.
Explore the coral reefs and search for marine life. Optional snorkeling stop.
Observe the local birds and mangrove eco-system
Return to the Leeward Marina.

location.meetingPoint: Leeward Marina, adjacent to the Dive Provo shop. Look for the 'Clear Kayak Adventures' sign.
location.endPoint: Leeward Marina

cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before

title: Turks & Caicos Beach Bliss: Horseback Ride & Ocean Dip
shortDescription: Experience the magic of Turks & Caicos with a guided horseback ride along Long Bay Beach, culminating in a refreshing swim with your equine companion. Unforgettable views and gentle waves await!
fullDescription:
Embark on an unforgettable adventure along the pristine shores of Long Bay Beach. Our gentle and well-trained horses are ready to take you on a scenic journey through the soft, white sand and turquoise waters. Feel the ocean breeze as you ride along the coastline, taking in the breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea. 

This experience is perfect for riders of all levels, from beginners to experienced equestrians. Our experienced guides will provide you with all the necessary instruction and ensure your safety throughout the ride. Get ready to bond with your horse as you wade into the clear, shallow waters for a unique swimming experience. 

Imagine the exhilaration of swimming with your horse, feeling the cool water on your skin and the gentle movement of your majestic partner. This is an opportunity to create lasting memories and experience the beauty of Turks & Caicos from a truly unique perspective. Don't miss out on this incredible adventure!
highlights: Horseback riding on the stunning Long Bay Beach
Swimming with your horse in the turquoise Caribbean Sea
Suitable for all riding levels, including beginners
Experienced guides providing instruction and ensuring safety
Breathtaking views of the ocean and coastline
Small group sizes for a personalized experience
Professional photos available for purchase
included: Horseback riding tour with experienced guides
whatToBring: Cash for gratuities and optional photo purchases
importantInfo: Maximum weight limit: 250 lbs (113 kg)
Minimum age: 12 years old
Participants must be in good physical condition
Pregnant women are not permitted to participate
Closed-toe shoes are recommended but not required
Please arrive 15 minutes prior to departure time
All participants must sign a waiver prior to the ride

itinerary.location: Long Bay Beach Parking Area (Next to The Shore Club)
itinerary.description: Meet your guides at the designated meeting point. Receive a brief introduction to the horses and a safety briefing.
Mount your horse and begin the scenic horseback ride along Long Bay Beach. Enjoy the stunning views and gentle ocean breeze.

itinerary.location: Shallow waters of Long Bay Beach
itinerary.description: Experience the thrill of swimming with your horse in the crystal-clear waters of Long Bay.
Return to the starting point. Dismount and say goodbye to your horse. Opportunity to purchase professional photos.

location.meetingPoint: Long Bay Beach Parking Area (Next to The Shore Club), Providenciales
location.endPoint: Long Bay Beach Parking Area (Next to The Shore Club), Providenciales

cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before

title: Discover Hidden Gems: Island Hopping Adventure in Turks & Caicos
shortDescription: Explore the stunning turquoise waters and secluded beaches of Turks & Caicos with our exhilarating island hopping tour. Discover hidden gems, snorkel vibrant coral reefs, and experience the true beauty of these islands.
fullDescription:
Embark on an unforgettable journey through the Turks & Caicos archipelago! This island hopping adventure takes you beyond the typical tourist spots to uncover hidden gems and experience the raw beauty of these Caribbean islands. We'll cruise aboard a comfortable and spacious powerboat, allowing you to soak in the breathtaking views and feel the refreshing ocean breeze. 

Our expert local guides will share fascinating insights into the history, culture, and marine life of the islands. We'll visit secluded beaches, snorkel in pristine waters teeming with colorful fish and coral, and explore uninhabited cays where you can truly escape the crowds. Keep an eye out for playful dolphins and majestic sea turtles!

This tour is perfect for those seeking adventure, relaxation, and a deeper connection with the natural wonders of Turks & Caicos. Create lasting memories as you discover the hidden paradise that awaits you just beyond the shores of Providenciales.
highlights: Explore secluded beaches and uninhabited cays
Snorkel in vibrant coral reefs with diverse marine life
Enjoy stunning views of the turquoise waters
Learn about the history and culture of the Turks & Caicos Islands
Relax and soak up the Caribbean sun on pristine sands
Spot dolphins, sea turtles, and other wildlife
Enjoy complimentary drinks and snacks onboard
included: Complimentary drinks (water, soft drinks, local beer)
notIncluded: Lunch (can be purchased at a local restaurant on one of the islands)
whatToBring: Cash for souvenirs and optional lunch
importantInfo: Minimum age is 12 years old.
Participants should be in good physical condition.
Pregnant women and individuals with back problems are not recommended to participate.
The itinerary is subject to change due to weather conditions.
Please inform us of any dietary restrictions or allergies at the time of booking.

itinerary.description: Meet your captain and crew at Leeward Marina for a brief safety briefing and introduction to the day's adventure.
Depart from Leeward Marina and cruise towards our first destination, Pine Cay.
Explore the pristine beaches of Pine Cay, a private island known for its tranquility and natural beauty. Opportunity for swimming and sunbathing.
Snorkel in the crystal-clear waters near Fort George Cay, a historical site with vibrant coral reefs and diverse marine life. Gear provided.
Visit Water Cay, also known as Iguana Island, home to a large population of endangered Rock Iguanas. Observe these fascinating creatures in their natural habitat.
Enjoy a scenic cruise back to Leeward Marina, with complimentary drinks and snacks onboard.
Arrive back at Leeward Marina. End of tour.

location.meetingPoint: Leeward Marina, Providenciales. Located at the end of Leeward Highway, near the Blue Haven Resort.
location.endPoint: Leeward Marina, Providenciales

cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before

title: Reel in the Big One: Turks & Caicos Fishing Adventure!
shortDescription: Experience the thrill of deep-sea fishing in the crystal-clear waters of Turks & Caicos! Join us for an unforgettable adventure targeting tuna, wahoo, mahi-mahi, and more.
fullDescription:
Embark on an exhilarating fishing expedition in the bountiful waters surrounding Providenciales. Our experienced local captain and crew will guide you to the prime fishing spots, where you'll have the chance to reel in some of the most sought-after game fish in the Caribbean. Whether you're a seasoned angler or a first-time fisherman, our charter is designed to provide an unforgettable experience for all skill levels. 

We provide top-of-the-line fishing equipment, including rods, reels, and tackle, ensuring you have everything you need to hook your dream catch. Our comfortable and well-maintained boat offers ample space for relaxation between bites, and our knowledgeable crew will be on hand to assist with baiting hooks, landing fish, and sharing their expertise about the local marine life. 

Prepare to be amazed by the stunning turquoise waters and breathtaking views of the Turks & Caicos coastline as you chase after tuna, wahoo, mahi-mahi, barracuda, and more. This fishing charter is not just about catching fish; it's about creating lasting memories and experiencing the beauty of the Caribbean Sea.
highlights: Target tuna, wahoo, mahi-mahi, and other game fish
Expert guidance from experienced local captain and crew
Top-of-the-line fishing equipment provided
Comfortable and spacious fishing boat
Breathtaking views of the Turks & Caicos coastline
Suitable for all skill levels, from beginner to expert
Memorable experience for families and groups
notIncluded: Lunch (can be arranged for an additional fee)
importantInfo: Minimum age is 12 years old.
Seasickness can occur; take preventative measures if susceptible.
All catches are subject to local fishing regulations.
In the event of inclement weather, the charter may be rescheduled or cancelled with a full refund.
Life jackets are provided and required to be worn during rough seas.

itinerary.description: Meet your captain and crew at Turtle Cove Marina. Board the boat and receive a safety briefing.
Depart from the marina and head to the prime fishing spots. The captain will explain the fishing techniques we'll be using.
Begin fishing! The crew will assist with baiting hooks and landing fish. Enjoy the thrill of the catch!
Head back to Turtle Cove Marina. Celebrate your catch and say goodbye to the crew.

location.meetingPoint: Turtle Cove Marina, Providenciales, near the Dive Provo shop. Look for the boat 'Island Dreamer'.
location.endPoint: Turtle Cove Marina, Providenciales

cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before

title: Soar Above Paradise: Parasailing Adventure in Grace Bay
shortDescription: Experience the thrill of parasailing over the turquoise waters of Grace Bay! Enjoy breathtaking views and unforgettable moments as you float high above one of the world's most beautiful beaches.
fullDescription:
Prepare for an exhilarating adventure with our parasailing experience in Grace Bay, Turks & Caicos! Feel the adrenaline rush as you gently ascend into the sky, lifted by the power of the ocean breeze. From your elevated vantage point, marvel at the panoramic views of Grace Bay's pristine beach, the vibrant coral reefs beneath the surface, and the endless expanse of the turquoise Atlantic Ocean. Keep an eye out for marine life, including turtles, dolphins, and even the occasional manta ray.

Our experienced and professional crew will ensure your safety and comfort throughout the entire experience. We use state-of-the-art equipment and adhere to the highest safety standards. Whether you're a seasoned thrill-seeker or a first-time parasailer, our friendly team will guide you through every step, ensuring a smooth and unforgettable flight. Share this incredible experience with a friend or loved one, as tandem parasailing is available.

After your exhilarating flight, relax and soak in the beauty of Grace Bay from a unique perspective. Capture stunning photos and create memories that will last a lifetime. This is the perfect way to add a touch of adventure to your Turks & Caicos vacation and experience the islands from a whole new angle. Book your parasailing adventure today and prepare for an unforgettable flight above paradise!
highlights: Breathtaking panoramic views of Grace Bay
Thrilling and safe parasailing experience
Experienced and professional crew
State-of-the-art equipment and safety standards
Opportunity to spot marine life from above
Tandem parasailing available
Unforgettable memories and photo opportunities
included: Parasailing flight (approximately 10-12 minutes in the air)
Boat ride to and from the parasailing location
whatToBring: Cash for gratuities and optional purchases
importantInfo: Minimum age is 12 years old. Participants under 18 must be accompanied by a parent or guardian.
Maximum weight capacity is 400 lbs for tandem flights.
Participants should be in good physical health and free from any medical conditions that could be aggravated by the activity.
Parasailing is weather dependent and may be cancelled or rescheduled due to unsafe conditions.
Pregnant women are not permitted to parasail.
Please arrive at the meeting point 15 minutes prior to your scheduled departure time.
No alcohol or drugs are permitted before or during the activity.

itinerary.location: Dive Provo Shop, Grace Bay Road
itinerary.description: Meet at Dive Provo Shop in Grace Bay for check-in and safety briefing.
Short walk to Grace Bay Beach where the boat awaits.
Board the parasailing boat and enjoy a scenic ride to the parasailing location.
Enjoy your exhilarating parasailing flight over Grace Bay!
Return to the beach by boat and disembark.

itinerary.location: Dive Provo Shop, Grace Bay Road
itinerary.description: Walk back to the Dive Provo shop.

location.meetingPoint: Dive Provo Shop, Grace Bay Road, Providenciales
location.endPoint: Grace Bay Beach near Dive Provo

cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before

title: Paddleboard Paradise: Explore Mangrove Channels & Hidden Beaches
shortDescription: Glide through crystal-clear turquoise waters and discover the untouched beauty of Turks & Caicos on a guided stand-up paddleboarding adventure. Explore mangrove channels, secluded beaches, and encounter vibrant marine life.
fullDescription:
Embark on an unforgettable stand-up paddleboarding journey through the enchanting waterways of Turks & Caicos. Our experienced local guides will lead you through a mesmerizing network of mangrove channels, where you'll discover a tranquil world teeming with native flora and fauna. Paddle along pristine coastlines, uncovering hidden beaches and secluded coves accessible only by water. Keep your eyes peeled for playful dolphins, graceful sea turtles, and colorful reef fish as you immerse yourself in the natural wonders of this tropical paradise.

This eco-friendly adventure is perfect for all skill levels, from beginners to seasoned paddleboarders. Our stable and easy-to-maneuver boards ensure a comfortable and enjoyable experience for everyone. Learn about the local ecosystem and the importance of preserving this natural treasure from our knowledgeable guides, who are passionate about sharing their love for Turks & Caicos.

Escape the crowds and connect with nature on this unique and rewarding paddleboarding excursion. Discover the hidden gems of Turks & Caicos and create memories that will last a lifetime. Capture stunning photos of the breathtaking scenery and embrace the serenity of this island paradise. This is more than just a paddleboarding tour; it's an opportunity to experience the true essence of Turks & Caicos.
highlights: Explore secluded mangrove channels and hidden beaches
Spot dolphins, sea turtles, and colorful reef fish
Learn about the local ecosystem from expert guides
Suitable for all skill levels, even beginners
Enjoy breathtaking views of the turquoise waters
Capture stunning photos of the natural beauty
Escape the crowds and connect with nature
importantInfo: Participants should be in good physical condition.
Minimum age is 12 years old. Participants under 18 must be accompanied by an adult.
Weight limit: 250 lbs.
This tour is weather dependent and may be cancelled or rescheduled due to unsafe conditions.
Please arrive at the meeting point 15 minutes prior to the scheduled departure time.

itinerary.description: Meet your guide at Leeward Marina and receive a safety briefing and paddleboarding instruction.
Begin your paddleboarding adventure through the tranquil mangrove channels.
Stop at a secluded beach on Half Moon Bay for swimming, snorkeling, and relaxation.
Paddle back towards Leeward Marina, enjoying the scenery along the way.
Return to Leeward Marina and end the tour.

location.meetingPoint: Leeward Marina, Providenciales. Dock E near the dive shop.
location.endPoint: Leeward Marina, Providenciales

cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before

title: Turks & Caicos Kiteboarding: Ride the Trade Winds!
shortDescription: Learn to kiteboard in the turquoise waters of Long Bay Beach! Our certified instructors will have you up and riding in no time, experiencing the thrill of harnessing the power of the Caribbean trade winds.
fullDescription:
Unleash your inner adventurer and discover the exhilaration of kiteboarding in the breathtaking Turks & Caicos Islands! This beginner-friendly kiteboarding lesson takes place on the pristine shores of Long Bay Beach, renowned for its shallow, calm waters and consistent trade winds – the perfect conditions for learning. Our experienced and IKO-certified instructors provide personalized guidance, ensuring your safety and progress every step of the way.

Starting with essential kite control techniques on land, you'll quickly transition to the water, mastering body dragging and water starts. Feel the adrenaline pump as you harness the power of the kite and begin to glide across the crystal-clear water. By the end of the lesson, you'll have the fundamental skills to continue your kiteboarding journey with confidence.

Whether you're a complete beginner or have some prior experience, our tailored instruction caters to all skill levels. Experience the ultimate blend of adventure and natural beauty as you learn a new sport in one of the world's most stunning destinations. Get ready to catch some air and create unforgettable memories on the turquoise waters of Turks & Caicos!

Our commitment to safety ensures a fun and rewarding experience. We use top-of-the-line equipment and adhere to strict safety protocols, allowing you to focus on learning and enjoying the thrill of kiteboarding.
highlights: Learn kiteboarding from IKO-certified instructors.
Ideal conditions at Long Bay Beach: shallow water and steady winds.
All equipment provided: kites, boards, harnesses, and safety gear.
Personalized instruction tailored to your skill level.
Small group sizes for individualized attention.
Experience the thrill of harnessing the Caribbean trade winds.
Safe and supportive learning environment.
included: Kiteboarding equipment (kite, board, harness, helmet, life vest)
whatToBring: Rash guard or t-shirt for sun protection
importantInfo: Minimum age: 12 years old.
Participants should be in good physical condition and able to swim.
Weight restrictions may apply (please inquire upon booking).
Lessons are weather-dependent and may be rescheduled due to unsafe conditions.
Advance booking is highly recommended.

itinerary.location: Long Bay Beach, near Kite Provo
itinerary.description: Meet your instructor at the designated meeting point on Long Bay Beach. Check-in and introductions.
Safety briefing and introduction to kiteboarding equipment. Learn about wind theory and kite control basics.
On-land kite control practice. Learn to launch and land the kite safely.
Water activities: body dragging and water starts. Practice riding the kite in the water.
Debriefing and wrap-up. Instructor provides feedback and tips for continued learning.

location.meetingPoint: Long Bay Beach, near the Kite Provo kite school (look for our flag!)
location.endPoint: Long Bay Beach, near the Kite Provo kite school

cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before

title: Secluded Beach Bliss: Private Picnic on Chalk Sound's Shores
shortDescription: Escape the crowds with a bespoke beach picnic experience on the pristine shores of Chalk Sound National Park. Enjoy turquoise waters, powdery sand, and gourmet delights in your own private paradise.
fullDescription:
Indulge in the ultimate Turks & Caicos luxury with a private beach picnic on the breathtaking Chalk Sound. Imagine sinking your toes into soft, white sand as you gaze upon the mesmerizing turquoise waters dotted with tiny, uninhabited islands. This exclusive experience begins with a scenic boat ride across the Sound, delivering you to a secluded beach where your personalized picnic awaits. 

Our team will set up a shaded oasis with comfortable seating, chilled beverages, and a delectable spread of gourmet treats featuring fresh, local flavors. Whether you crave Caribbean jerk chicken, grilled lobster, or vegetarian delights, our catering options cater to every palate. Bask in the sun, swim in the crystal-clear waters, or simply relax and soak up the stunning natural beauty that surrounds you. 

This is more than just a picnic; it's an unforgettable memory crafted just for you. Perfect for couples seeking romance, families wanting quality time, or groups celebrating special occasions, our private beach picnics offer an unparalleled level of luxury and tranquility. Let us create your perfect island escape on the shores of Chalk Sound.
highlights: Private beach location on Chalk Sound National Park
Gourmet picnic lunch with customizable menu options
Scenic boat transfer across the turquoise waters
Comfortable shaded seating area
Chilled beverages and refreshments
Opportunity for swimming and sunbathing
Personalized service from our dedicated team
included: Private boat transfer to and from the beach
Gourmet picnic lunch with customizable menu
importantInfo: Confirmation will be received at time of booking.
This is a private tour/activity. Only your group will participate.
Minimum of 2 people per booking.
Please advise any specific dietary requirements at time of booking.
Weather dependent. In case of cancellation due to weather, you will be given the option of an alternative date or full refund.

itinerary.location: Turks & Caicos Boat Rentals, Chalk Sound Drive
itinerary.description: Meet your captain at Turks & Caicos Boat Rentals located on Chalk Sound Drive for check-in and a brief orientation.
Enjoy a scenic boat ride across the mesmerizing turquoise waters of Chalk Sound, taking in the stunning views of the surrounding islands.
Arrive at your private beach location where your picnic setup awaits. Relax, swim, sunbathe, and enjoy your gourmet lunch.
Pack up your belongings and prepare for your return boat transfer.

title: Dive for Your Dinner: Authentic Conch Diving Adventure
shortDescription: Experience the thrill of free diving for the iconic Turks & Caicos conch! Learn from local experts and savor the fruits of your labor with a beachside conch salad feast.
fullDescription:
Embark on an unforgettable aquatic adventure and discover the traditional way of harvesting conch in the pristine waters of Turks & Caicos. Our expert local guides will lead you to the best conch beds, sharing their knowledge of the marine ecosystem and sustainable harvesting practices. Learn the art of free diving – no scuba gear needed! – and feel the rush of retrieving your own conch from the seabed. 

After your diving adventure, relax on a secluded beach as your guides prepare a delicious, freshly made conch salad right before your eyes. Savor the unique flavors of the islands while enjoying the stunning turquoise views. This is more than just a tour; it's an immersive experience that connects you to the heart of Turks & Caicos culture and natural beauty.

Capture stunning underwater photos and create lasting memories as you become a part of the island's vibrant marine heritage. This tour provides an authentic and sustainable way to experience the magic of Turks & Caicos, leaving you with a deeper appreciation for its natural treasures. Get ready for an adventure that you'll be talking about for years to come!
highlights: Learn to free dive for conch from experienced local guides
Discover sustainable harvesting practices to protect the marine environment
Enjoy a freshly prepared conch salad on a secluded beach
Experience the thrill of retrieving your own conch from the seabed
Explore the vibrant underwater world of Turks & Caicos
Support local communities and sustainable tourism
Capture stunning underwater photos and create lasting memories
included: Instruction and guidance from experienced local divers
notIncluded: Hotel pickup and drop-off (available as add-on)
whatToBring: Cash for gratuities or additional purchases
importantInfo: Participants must be able to swim comfortably.
Minimum age for participation is 12 years old.
Pregnant women and individuals with certain medical conditions should consult with their doctor before participating.
Conch harvesting is subject to local regulations and seasonal closures. We adhere to all guidelines to ensure sustainable practices.
We reserve the right to alter the itinerary due to weather conditions or other unforeseen circumstances.

itinerary.description: Meet your guides at Leeward Marina and board the boat. Enjoy a safety briefing and overview of the day's adventure.
Arrive at the conch diving site. Receive instructions on free diving techniques and sustainable harvesting. Begin your conch diving adventure!
Relax on a secluded beach while your guides prepare a fresh conch salad using your harvested conch. Enjoy the delicious flavors and stunning views.
Board the boat and enjoy a scenic ride back to Leeward Marina. Reflect on your incredible conch diving experience.

location.meetingPoint: Leeward Marina, Providenciales. Look for the 'Island Vibes Conch Dive' sign near the dock.
location.endPoint: Leeward Marina, Providenciales

cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before

title: Paddle Through Paradise: Turks & Caicos Mangrove Kayak Eco-Tour
shortDescription: Explore the vibrant mangrove ecosystem of the Turks & Caicos Islands by kayak! Discover hidden creeks, spot unique wildlife, and learn about the importance of these vital habitats with our expert guides.
fullDescription:
Embark on an unforgettable journey into the heart of the Turks & Caicos Islands' unique mangrove ecosystem. Our guided kayak tour takes you through the intricate network of channels and creeks, where you'll witness the incredible biodiversity that thrives within these protected areas. Paddle alongside lush green mangroves, home to a variety of birds, fish, turtles, and even juvenile marine life.

Our knowledgeable guides will share fascinating insights into the ecological significance of the mangroves and their vital role in protecting the coastline and supporting the local ecosystem. Learn about the different species of mangroves, their unique adaptations, and the crucial role they play in filtering water and providing habitat for countless creatures. You'll feel a sense of awe as you navigate through this natural wonderland, surrounded by the serene beauty of the turquoise waters and lush vegetation.

This tour is perfect for nature lovers, adventure seekers, and anyone looking to experience the hidden gems of Turks & Caicos. Whether you're a seasoned kayaker or a beginner, our stable and easy-to-maneuver kayaks make this an accessible and enjoyable experience for all. Discover a side of Turks & Caicos that most visitors never see, and create lasting memories in this unspoiled paradise.
highlights: Explore the intricate mangrove channels by kayak
Observe diverse wildlife, including birds, fish, and turtles
Learn about the ecological importance of mangroves from expert guides
Enjoy a peaceful and serene paddling experience
Suitable for all skill levels, from beginners to experienced kayakers
Perfect for nature lovers and adventure seekers
Small group size for a personalized experience
included: Guided tour with a knowledgeable local expert
importantInfo: Minimum age is 12 years old.
Participants should be in good physical condition and able to paddle for 2-3 hours.
Pregnant women are not allowed on this tour.
Maximum weight limit per kayak is 250 lbs.
Tour is weather dependent and may be cancelled due to unsafe conditions.
Must arrive 15 minutes prior to departure time.

itinerary.description: Meet your guide at the Leeward Marina. Check-in and receive a brief safety briefing and paddling instructions.
Launch your kayak and begin paddling into the protected mangrove channels.
Explore the mangrove ecosystem, observing wildlife and learning about the local flora and fauna. Your guide will point out interesting features and answer your questions.
Take a short break at a secluded cove for photos and relaxation. Enjoy the scenery and soak in the tranquility.
Paddle back towards the Leeward Marina.
Return kayaks and debrief. Time for questions and farewells.

location.meetingPoint: Leeward Marina, located at the end of Leeward Highway in Providenciales. Look for the 'Eco Adventures' sign.
location.endPoint: Leeward Marina, Providenciales

cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before

title: Turks & Caicos Stargazing: Celestial Secrets Under the Caribbean Sky
shortDescription: Escape the city lights and journey to a secluded beach on Providenciales for an unforgettable night of stargazing. Discover constellations, planets, and celestial wonders with expert guidance and powerful telescopes.
fullDescription:
Venture beyond the shimmering turquoise waters and pristine beaches to discover the hidden beauty of the Turks & Caicos night sky. Our stargazing experience begins as the sun dips below the horizon, painting the sky in vibrant hues. We'll transport you away from the resorts to a secluded, dark beach on the western coast of Providenciales, far from light pollution, where the stars truly come alive. 

Under the expert guidance of our knowledgeable astronomy guide, you'll learn to identify constellations, planets, and other celestial objects. We'll use high-powered telescopes to observe distant galaxies, nebulae, and the craters of the moon, bringing the universe closer than you ever imagined.  Our guides will share fascinating stories and myths associated with the stars, enriching your understanding of the cosmos and its influence on ancient cultures.

Whether you're a seasoned astronomer or a curious beginner, this stargazing experience will leave you in awe of the vastness and beauty of the universe. This is more than just looking at stars; it's a journey of discovery, a chance to connect with the cosmos, and an unforgettable memory made under the Caribbean sky.
highlights: Unforgettable stargazing experience on a secluded beach.
Expert guidance from a knowledgeable astronomy guide.
Use of high-powered telescopes for detailed celestial viewing.
Learn to identify constellations, planets, and other celestial objects.
Hear captivating stories and myths about the stars.
Enjoy a complimentary non-alcoholic beverage under the stars.
Small group size for a personalized experience.
included: Transportation to and from your hotel (Grace Bay area)
Expert guidance from an astronomy guide
Red light torches for night vision preservation
whatToBring: Light sweater or jacket (evenings can be cool)
Camera (optional, but low-light photography is challenging)
importantInfo: This tour is weather dependent. We will cancel and offer a full refund if conditions are not suitable for stargazing.
Minimum age is 12 years old.
Please inform us of any dietary restrictions or allergies in advance.
The meeting point pick up time will be confirmed 24 hours before the tour departure.
While we strive for optimal viewing conditions, cloud cover can occasionally obstruct visibility.

itinerary.description: Pick-up from your hotel lobby in the Grace Bay area. Transfer to the secluded beach location.
Arrival at the beach. Setup of telescopes and introduction to the evening's stargazing program.
Stargazing session with expert guidance and telescope viewing. Learn about constellations, planets, and deep-sky objects. Enjoy complimentary beverages.
Wrap up the stargazing session. Prepare for departure.
Transfer back to your hotel.

location.meetingPoint: Hotel lobby within Grace Bay area. Specific hotel name to be confirmed upon booking.
location.endPoint: Your hotel within the Grace Bay area.

cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before

title: Indulge Your Senses: A Luxurious Spa Escape in Grace Bay
shortDescription: Escape to a sanctuary of tranquility and rejuvenation. Enjoy bespoke treatments at The Palms Turks and Caicos, leaving you refreshed and revitalized.
fullDescription:
Immerse yourself in the ultimate pampering experience at The Palms Turks and Caicos' renowned spa. Our exclusive spa day is designed to melt away stress and restore your natural radiance. Begin with a revitalizing welcome drink upon arrival, followed by a personalized consultation to tailor your treatments to your specific needs. Experience a blissful aromatherapy massage using locally sourced essential oils, targeting tension and promoting deep relaxation. 

Next, indulge in a customized facial designed to cleanse, exfoliate, and hydrate your skin, leaving you with a youthful glow. Unwind further in our serene relaxation lounge, sipping herbal teas and enjoying healthy snacks. With access to the spa's luxurious amenities, including steam room, sauna, and tranquility pool, this spa day is a true escape from the everyday. 

Our expert therapists are dedicated to providing exceptional service and creating a memorable experience. Whether you're seeking a moment of solitude or a special treat with a loved one, our luxury spa day is the perfect way to rejuvenate your body, mind, and spirit. Discover a new level of well-being and leave feeling refreshed, revitalized, and ready to embrace the beauty of Turks and Caicos.

Conclude your serene escape by soaking up the Caribbean sun by the world-famous Grace Bay Beach.
highlights: Bespoke aromatherapy massage with locally sourced oils
Personalized facial for radiant skin
Access to steam room, sauna, and tranquility pool
Welcome drink and healthy snacks
Serene relaxation lounge with herbal teas
Expert therapists dedicated to your well-being
Located at the award-winning The Palms Turks and Caicos
included: Access to steam room, sauna, and tranquility pool
notIncluded: Transportation to/from The Palms Turks and Caicos
importantInfo: Please arrive 15 minutes prior to your scheduled appointment time.
Minimum age for spa treatments is 16 years old. Guests under 18 must be accompanied by an adult.
Please inform us of any medical conditions or allergies prior to your appointment.
Pregnant women should consult with their doctor before booking spa treatments.
We recommend booking in advance to secure your preferred time slot.
Please refrain from using mobile phones in treatment rooms and relaxation areas.

Personalized consultation with a spa therapist to discuss your needs and customize your treatments.
Enjoy a 60-minute aromatherapy massage with locally sourced essential oils.
Indulge in a 60-minute customized facial for radiant skin.
Relax and unwind in the serene relaxation lounge, sipping herbal teas and enjoying healthy snacks.
Enjoy complimentary access to the steam room, sauna, and tranquility pool.

title: Taste of the Islands: Authentic Turks & Caicos Rum Tasting Tour
shortDescription: Discover the rich history and vibrant flavors of Turks & Caicos rum with a guided tasting experience featuring local distilleries and artisanal cocktails. Immerse yourself in the island spirit!
fullDescription:
Embark on a sensory journey through the heart of Turks & Caicos rum culture. Our 'Taste of the Islands' tour takes you beyond the beach and into the world of locally crafted rum. Starting at the historic Cheshire Hall Plantation, you'll learn about the islands' rum-making heritage before indulging in a curated tasting experience. We'll then venture to a local rum shop, experiencing the lively atmosphere and unique blends loved by locals. Finally, skilled mixologists will demonstrate the art of crafting exquisite rum cocktails, using fresh, locally sourced ingredients, with of course, you sampling each creation.

This isn't just about drinking rum; it's about understanding the story behind each bottle, from the sugar cane fields to the meticulous distillation process. You'll discover the subtle nuances that differentiate each rum, learn about the aging process, and appreciate the artistry involved in creating these exceptional spirits. Our expert guides will share fascinating anecdotes and insights, ensuring you gain a true appreciation for Turks & Caicos rum.

Whether you're a seasoned rum connoisseur or simply curious to explore the local flavors, this tour is a must-do for anyone seeking an authentic and memorable Turks & Caicos experience. Prepare your taste buds for a tantalizing adventure that will leave you with a deeper connection to the islands and its vibrant culture.
highlights: Guided tour of Cheshire Hall Plantation
Exclusive rum tasting experience with local distillers
Visit to a local rum shop for an authentic cultural experience
Cocktail demonstration with expertly crafted rum cocktails
Learn about the history and production of Turks & Caicos rum
Sample a variety of rums, from light and refreshing to dark and complex
Small group size for a personalized and intimate experience
included: Guided tour of Cheshire Hall Plantation
Rum tasting flight at select locations
whatToBring: Cash for souvenirs or additional drinks
importantInfo: Participants must be 18 years or older to consume alcohol. ID may be required.
Please drink responsibly.
Not recommended for pregnant women.
Please advise of any dietary restrictions or allergies at the time of booking.

Experience the local culture with a visit to a popular rum shop, sampling local favorites.
